mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (post_id, contents, user_id, sub_comment_id) VALUES (#{postId}, #{contents}, #{userId}, #{subCommentId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, post_id AS postId, contents, user_id AS userId, sub_comment_id AS subCommentId, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM comments WHERE post_id = #{postId}
